text: Amnesty is seen like a pardon given by the government to a group of people. This is usually for a political offense.Bryan A. Gardner (ed.). 2009. Blacks Law Dictionary (9th ed.). St. Paul, MN: West, p. 99 Though the term general pardon has a similar definition, an amnesty constitutes more than a pardon, in so much as it obliterates all legal remembrance of the offense. Amnesty is used the same way as freedom. ==References== ==Related pages== *Amnesty International Category:Criminal justice Category:Freedom Category:Peace
title: Amnesty
